definition: perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: We reported one case of eccrine poroma, which was located on the hip of a 40-year-old man.
sentences.chinese: 我們報道一例40歲男性發生在臀部的小汗腺汗孔瘤。

sentences.english: So a diagnosis of disseminated superficial porokeratosis complicated by psoriasis vulgaris was made.
sentences.chinese: 文中對銀屑病併發汗孔角化病的可能原因進行了討論。

sentences.english: The acral sites are the most commonly affected regions. Hip or buttock as a location of origin has rarely been reported.
sentences.chinese: 肢端爲最常見部位，臀部小汗腺汗孔瘤很少有報道。

definition: pathogeny (cause of disease) in TCM/as opposed to vital energy 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4]
bodily fluids (general term in Chinese medicine)
silted up/obstructed by silt/variant of 瘀滯|瘀滞[yu1 zhi4]
(in Chinese medicine) stasis (of blood or other fluids)
